head.title: Anahuacalmecac International University Preparatory of North America

meta.name: description
meta.content: Semillas Community Schools is comprised of Anahuacalmecac International University Preparatory and Xinaxcalmecac Academia. Semillas is a 21st Century Indigenous International Baccalaureate World School in Los Angeles, CA.

a.span: International University Preparatory of North America

header.marquee: In accordance with state and county guidance in response to the COVID-19 pandemic, Anahuacalmecac will offer continuity of learning education through distance learning media for the rest of the 2020-21 academic year De acuerdo con la guía estatal y del condado en respuesta a la pandemia de COVID-19, Anahuacalmecac ofrecerá aprendizaje continuo a través de medios de educación a distancia durante el resto del año académico 2020-21.

li.a: Los Angeles' First Indigenous World Schools

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1366px; height: 678px;

div.aside:
Within each of us, there's a seed.
Of each of us, a sower.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 303px; height: 195px;

section.p: We are looking for volunteers willing to help Anahuacalmecac during the COVID 19 pandemic. Click for more info and to sign-up.

h1.a: AIUPNA Distance Learning: Student and Parent Resources

section.p: While our school sites are closed, Anahuacalmecac will continue to provide a high-quality education. Through school-wide efforts, students will have access to computers, online resources, classes and support through our distance learning program.
On Friday, March 27th from 10AM to 2PM the County Federation of Labor will be hosting a massive food distribution at the IBEW Training Center in Commerce. Click for more info

Anahuacalmecac uses One Call Now to send emergency and informational notifications to keep you informed of important events, activities, and last minute changes. Anahuacalmecac currently calls you with voice notification messages and would like to be able to send important alerts to your cell phone as text messages. If you would like to receive text message notifications, text the word, Alert, to 22300.
Here are a few guidelines to help our parents and students learn how to use Google Classroom.

h1.a: FREE MEALS FOR ANY K-12 STUDENTS

section.p:
Anahuacalmecac, in partnership with the learning enrichment after-school program, 501(c)3, will provide nutritious meals to all students who need them during the temporary site closure of schools.
-The Grab & Go Food Center will be open beginning Wednesday, March 18 through March 30, 2020 or until LA County advises otherwise subject to developing conditions and limitations.
-SITE: 4736 Huntington Drive So, LA, CA 90032
-Centers will be staffed weekdays from 8:00-12:00 PM.
-Every child can take home two nutritious meals open to all children under 18.
THIS EFFORT IS BEING ORGANIZED INDEPENDENT OF THE LAUSD AND WITHOUT ADDITIONAL SUPPORT.
As of March 16th, 2020 all after school activities will be canceled for 2 weeks.
Extraordinary measures to be taken by all LA schools

h1.a: Low Cost Internet Access for Students

section.p: If your child qualifies for free lunch a nonprofit provides support for low-cost internet access from AT&T or Spectrum.
Learn more about the Coronavirus (COVID-19) and the ways you can protect yourself and your family.

h1.a: Thank You Lauren Bon and Metabolic Studio

section.p: Anahuacalmecac, the only autonomous Indigenous K -12 Charter School in Los Angeles, is eternally grateful to the generous support provided by Lauren Bon and Metabolic Studio.

h1.a: Are you interested in Indigenous Education?

section.p:
On behalf of the Indigenous Education NOW COALITION, we are inviting you to attend the Indigenous Education NOW Coalition Community Forum, Saturday, November 23 from 9:30 - 2:00 PM.
Please join us for a community forum to discuss efforts to improve Indigenous education in Los Angeles. Hear about work underway such as curriculum reform efforts, plans to hold local public school districts accountable to local Tribes, and Indigenous students, families, and communities, and more.
Click link for more information.

We are proud to inform you that Anahuacalmecac was awarded a grant to cover costs for energy-saving facilities improvements in lighting and a complete overhaul of our heating and cooling system at 4990 Huntington Drive.

Los Angeles, CA 90032

a.span: International University Preparatory of North America

div.p: Non-discrimination: At Semillas Community Schools, we value diversity and equality for all of our students, and we will not discriminate against any student on the basis of ethnicity, national origin, gender, orientation or ability.
